issue.title: Image Solution runs with catkin setup but not using docker compose

content.raw:
Arthur,

I’m not asking Hector to send the Docker image for his solution neither is code.  
  
Hector,

Yes, you can attach your Dockerfile to docker-compose.yml file to an email and send them to [subt-help@googlegroups.com](mailto:subt-help@googlegroups.com).

Please read my two previous posts since you didn’t answer some of my questions/requests.
